abstract: ` i wanted to kill myself ' : how leon mckenzie tackled suicide .
article: leon mckenzie seemed to have the world at his feet . as a premier league footballer he was scoring goals against manchester united but on the inside he was going through hell . this is a closer look into why he reached rock bottom , and ended up literally fighting back . if you or anyone you know need help with suicidal tendencies do n't hesitate to contact maytree here : 7263 7070more information on leo 's film ` ten count : licensed by : the audio networkanw2836 _ 92 blue static 2anw2920 _ 01 desolate beautyanw2921 _ 08 midnight in london 2subscribe to copa90 : out copa90 us for the north american voice on the global game : out our new website : copa90 : at copa90 we believe that football is the universal language .

we 're here to entertain , inform and celebrate football and its fans . whether it 's chats and challenges with your favourite footballers , in depth documentaries about fan culture or amazing animations and explainers about the biggest stories in the game , copa90 is how football feels . twitter - - - - - copa90leave us a comment below ! auteur : copa90tags : copa90 football football news soccer soccer news fan tv premier league la liga football fan tv arsenal man city man united chelsea liverpool tottenham everton barcelona real madrid football transfers transfer rumours psg bayern munich juventus champions league europa league fifa world cup football highlights football debategepost : 16 januari 2018 .
